overview: Three free and romantic young people live a life with their own thoughts: some are eager to get rid of singleness, some want to debauch before getting married, some want to gain a foothold in the big city. Because of an emotional derailment, the three kinked into a mess of "joking and scolding". When various values ​​collide, when a person needs to balance family friendship and love...their chaotic life is like half a comedy.
title: Almost a Comedy
